description:
Pop can-sized when packed, and light enough to carry for emergencies. This bivy is actually durable enough to be your shelter on a fast-and-light trip. Use it with a tarp in heavy rain or snow, or to increase the warmth of your bag in a tent during shoulder-season camping.

  • Light, breathable 15-denier SilNylon top fends off dew, frost, and light precipitation
  • Lightweight 15-denier nylon bottom has an Xtreme Shield waterproof coating that won't degrade like traditional PU coatings
  • 91cm wide at the shoulder, tapering to 58cm at the foot
  • Basic design has a simple flap closure, no zip, no bug mesh
name: MSR E-Bivy
